name: hyper-beam
effect: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
short_effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Powerful, but leaves the user immobile the next turn.
flavor_text.emerald: Powerful, but leaves the user immobile the next turn.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A severely damaging attack that makes the user rest on the next turn.
